graphicmotor.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphicmotor.entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleRect, TextEntity, TexturedEntity

    public abstract class Entity
extends Object
    The class Entity define the main behavior of any entity, init(GL2) and render(GL2, GLU, GLUT), and provide to any extension common data to refine them rendering
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    goozi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Entity()

      Provide a valid GLcontext for any entity which need it to finish them initialization.
      abstract void render(GL2 gl, GLU glu, GLUT glut)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public abstract void init(GL2 gl)
        Provide a valid GLcontext for any entity which need it to finish them initialization.

        Some entity may need a valid GL context to achieve they initialization.

        Entity guarantee that this method will be called before any render(GL2, GLU, GLUT) method.

        Parameters:
        gl - current GL context

      • render

        public abstract void render(GL2 gl,
                            GLU glu,
                            GLUT glut)
        When an entity need to be render, this method will be call

        Every required tools for any OpenGL rendering are provide as parameters

        Parameters:
        gl - current GL context
        glu - current GLU context
        glut - current GLUT context

      • setPosision

        public void setPosision(float fX,
                        float fY)
        Set the entity position
        Parameters:
        fX - horizontal value
        fY - vertical value

      • setSize

        public void setSize(float fW,
                    float fH)
        Set the entity size
        Parameters:
        fW - width of the entity
        fH - height of the entity

      • setPix

        public void setPix(int xPix,
                   int yPix)
        Set the current top-left corner's pixel of the entity ( binded with the position )
        Parameters:
        xPix - x pixel value
        yPix - y pixel value

      • setColorMask

        public void setColorMask(float r,
                         float g,
                         float b)
        Set the color mask apply over the entity
        Parameters:
        r - red value 0.0f -> 1.0f
        g - green value 0.0f -> 1.0f
        b - blue value 0.0f -> 1.0f

      • setEnable

        public void setEnable(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable the entity
        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable, false to disable

      • enable

        public boolean enable()
        Returns:
        true if the entity is enabled else false

      • setZIndex

        public void setZIndex(int zIndex)
        Set the Z-Index of the entity
        Parameters:
        zIndex -

      • getZIndex

        public int getZIndex()
        Returns:
        the zIndex of the entity
